MESSAGE.JP: たしは、夜の校舎、その廊下に居た。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood in the hallway of the school at night.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood in the hallway of the school at night.

MESSAGE.JP: 今のはなんだ？
にか、あるいは直接網膜にか、光る文字が映し出された。
MESSAGE.EN: In the air, or perhaps written directly onto my retina, I can see letters written with light.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the air, or perhaps written directly onto my retina, I can see letters written with light.

MESSAGE.JP: ルファベットだった。
、Ａ、Ｍ、Ｅ、Ｓ、Ｔ、Ａ、Ｒ、Ｔ。
MESSAGE.EN: G, A, M, E, S, T, A, R, T.
MESSAGE.Translation: G, A, M, E, S, T, A, R, T.

MESSAGE.JP: ームスタート。
誰へ向けて？
あたしにか？
ームオーバーまで用意してあった…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was even a game over sequence...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was even a game over sequence...

MESSAGE.JP: れだけ馬鹿にしてるのよ…。
時風@「ふん…また来たのか」
っと。あと一回死ねば１００回死んだ記念ね。
MESSAGE.EN: Almost forgot. If I died one more time, I would have made it to one hundred.
MESSAGE.Translation: Almost forgot. If I died one more time, I would have made it to one hundred.

MESSAGE.JP: ああぁぁぁーーーーっ、１に戻ってるぅぅっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Whaaaaaaaaaaat, it went back to one!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Whaaaaaaaaaaat, it went back to one!!

MESSAGE.JP: までの積み重ねは一体ぃぃぃ…!!
MESSAGE.EN: All my hard work, for nothing...!
MESSAGE.Translation: All my hard work, for nothing...!

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、あたしは死にまくって何をしてるんだ!?
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, what in world was I dying for?
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, what in world was I dying for?

MESSAGE.JP: ワイ？
沙耶@「パンツ一枚に泣いたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I cried over a pair of panties...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I cried over a pair of panties...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あほか、あたしはあぁぁぁぁぁーーーっ!!」
時風@「まったく、とんだ余興だ」
沙耶@「同じ場所で同じ死に方しちゃったじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I died in the same way at the same place!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I died in the same way at the same place!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「そう。ゲームみたいなものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Right. Think of it as a game.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Right. Think of it as a game.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「おまえ、他のことも言ってみろっ」
時風@「また、始めるのかい」
時風@「わかった。ゲームスタートといこう」
沙耶@「唾飛ばしてやろうかしら。んーーー…ぺっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Want me to spit on you? Pfftttt...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Want me to spit on you? Pfftttt...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「だがおまえにとっては過酷な世界だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝But this is a cruel world for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝But this is a cruel world for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「去りたくなったら、迷わず己へ向けて引き金を引くがいい」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝When you decide to leave, just point the gun toward yourself and pull the trigger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ズボンにつばつけたまま格好つけてやんの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You look hilarious with my spit stuck on your trousers!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You look hilarious with my spit stuck on your trousers!❞

たしは仕掛けの理不尽さを訴えた。

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「雑誌とかで１２周年記念とか、中途半端なのに、強引に記念号にするのあるじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You know how some magazines have a 12th anniversary issue? I mean, what's so special about 12?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You know how some magazines have a 12th anniversary issue? I mean, what's so special about 12?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「また、始めるのかい」
沙耶@「キリ番なら１０か２０にしとけよって話で、１５だったらまだしも、１２周年ってどうなのよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If you want a round number, go for 10 or 20. Fifteen I can still understand, but 12? Seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If you want a round number, go for 10 or 20. Fifteen I can still understand, but 12? Seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「だがおまえにとっては過酷な世界だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝But this is a cruel world for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝But this is a cruel world for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ならもう毎年やっちゃえばいいじゃない。翌年も１３周年記念やっちゃいなさいよっ、１４周年記念もやっちゃいなさいよっ、好きにやっちゃったらいいじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Why not have an anniversary issue every year. Then you'll have a 13th anniversary issue and next year it'll be the 14th. Just do whatever you want!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Why not have an anniversary issue every year. Then you'll have a 13th anniversary issue and next year it'll be the 14th. Just do whatever you want!❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず笑っておこう。
沙耶@「あは…」
沙耶@「あーはっはっはっは！」
の世界のボスが目の前に立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The boss of this world was standing before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The boss of this world was standing before me.

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「まったく、とんだ余興だ」
時風@「そう。ゲームみたいなものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Right. Think of it as a game.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Right. Think of it as a game.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「また、始めるのかい」
あたしは、もちろんと頷いてみせた。
時風@「わかった。ゲームスタートといこう」
るほど、そういうことか。
りにもよって、『ゲームスタート』だなんて。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason why he said ❛game start.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason why he said ❛game start.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れを口癖とするこのキャラクターを選んだ、あたしに対する皮肉。
MESSAGE.EN: He went with the character who uses this expression as a way to mock me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He went with the character who uses this expression as a way to mock me.

MESSAGE.JP: 果応報とでも言いたいのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was he trying to say you reap what you sow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was he trying to say you reap what you sow?

MESSAGE.JP: ことん意地の悪い奴だ。
時風@「だがおまえにとっては過酷な世界だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝But this is a cruel world for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝But this is a cruel world for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「去りたくなったら、迷わず己へ向けて引き金を引くがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝When you decide to leave, just point the gun toward yourself and pull the trigger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝When you decide to leave, just point the gun toward yourself and pull the trigger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あは…」
沙耶@「あーはっはっはっは！」
が消えていく。霧がはれるように。
すん！
ってやった。
、あたしがホルスターから銃を取り出した時点で、姿は消えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But the moment I pulled the gun out of my holster, his figure disappeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the moment I pulled the gun out of my holster, his figure disappeared.

MESSAGE.JP: 手は余裕じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: He was so full of confidence.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was so full of confidence.

MESSAGE.JP: 全になめられている。
ってやるも、いつもの通りその姿は霧散する。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I managed to shoot, his figure just dispersed like usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I managed to shoot, his figure just dispersed like usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あは…」
沙耶@「あーはっはっはっは！」
いわ。あたしの執念を見せつけてやる。
MESSAGE.EN: That was fine. I'd show him my tenacity.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was fine. I'd show him my tenacity.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「んなことするかっ！」
沙耶@「うせろっ、このやろおおおおおぉぉぉぉーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Get out of my sight, you bastaaaaaaard―!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Get out of my sight, you bastaaaaaaard―!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: えた。
然倒したわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, I didn't defeat him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, I didn't defeat him.

MESSAGE.JP: ち去っただけだ。
れは…ゲーム。
んなもんじゃない。
たしにとっては、これがすべてなんだ。
こに居るあたしがすべて。
にも先にも何もない。
だけがあたしなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Only the me right then and there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only the me right then and there.

MESSAGE.JP: ＡＭＥ　ＳＴＡＲＴなんて演出まで用意されて、完全に舐められてる。
MESSAGE.EN: To go as far as to prepare a GAME START sign, he was very much mocking me.
MESSAGE.Translation: To go as far as to prepare a GAME START sign, he was very much mocking me.

MESSAGE.JP: うはいくか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wouldn't let him have it his way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wouldn't let him have it his way.

MESSAGE.JP: っちは本気なんだ。
たしはあたしの欲しいものを手に入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was determined to get my hands on what I want.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was determined to get my hands on what I want.

MESSAGE.JP: しんでる余裕なんてなかった、と後悔させてやろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I would make him regret taking me lightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would make him regret taking me lightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あは…」
沙耶@「あーはっはっはっは！」
と、声に出して笑っちゃまずいわ。
ろそろ時間だもの。
樹くんがやってくるのを待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited for the time when Riki-kun would come.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited for the time when Riki-kun would come.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「この学園の生徒だな…なぜこんな時間にいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You are a student from this school... Why are you here at this hour?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You are a student from this school... Why are you here at this hour?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の中で彼を取り押さえ…
MESSAGE.EN: I seized him in the darkness...
MESSAGE.Translation: I seized him in the darkness...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「手を離したら、スタートだ。いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Once I let go of your arms, start running. Got that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Once I let go of your arms, start running. Got that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: して解放。
音が聞こえた。
たしは闇の中を跳び、その音の方へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I jumped in the darkness and headed toward the direction of the sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: I jumped in the darkness and headed toward the direction of the sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 年が緊張したようにびくびくしながら歩いている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a nervous looking boy, walking timidly.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a nervous looking boy, walking timidly.

MESSAGE.JP: っちに気づいたようだが、時既に遅し。
MESSAGE.EN: He noticed me now, but it was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: He noticed me now, but it was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: 年を背後から取り押さえていた。
沙耶@「この学園の生徒だな…なぜこんな時間にいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You are a student from this school... Why are you here at this hour?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You are a student from this school... Why are you here at this hour?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 調はできるだけ簡素に、訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked him as simply as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked him as simply as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「教室に忘れたノートを取りにきたんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was on my way to my classroom to get my notebook...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was on my way to my classroom to get my notebook...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 抗はまったくない。
沙耶@「振り返らずに、廊下を走りきり正面の非常ドアから外に出られるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Do you think you'll be able to run straight down the hallway and get outside from the emergency exit door in front without turning around?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Do you think you'll be able to run straight down the hallway and get outside from the emergency exit door in front without turning around?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「非常ドアを開けるのには手間取るかもしれませんが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, but I think getting the door open would be a bit hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, but I think getting the door open would be a bit hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「普通に開く」
理樹@「どうも…」
沙耶@「手を離したら、スタートだ。いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Once I let go of your arms, start running. Got that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Once I let go of your arms, start running. Got that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I let go of his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let go of his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 格好に走り出す少年。
MESSAGE.EN: The boy, though unsteady on his feet, ran.
MESSAGE.Translation: The boy, though unsteady on his feet, ran.

MESSAGE.JP: がドアを閉ざすと同時、それらは現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Right as he closed the door, they appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right as he closed the door, they appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: たしは立て続けに、二丁の拳銃の弾を撃ち尽くす。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out both of my guns and opened fire.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out both of my guns and opened fire.

MESSAGE.JP: う立っている者はいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no one left standing.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no one left standing.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「うっわー、つえぇ…」
の場にしゃがみ込んでしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I bent down where I was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bent down where I was.

MESSAGE.JP: 以上に体力を奪われた気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt more exhausted than ever before...
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt more exhausted than ever before...

MESSAGE.JP: かもあの人数…。
MESSAGE.EN: And why were there so many enemies...
MESSAGE.Translation: And why were there so many enemies...

MESSAGE.JP: 下迷宮に入る前からこれだけの手勢って…
MESSAGE.EN: So many before entering the maze...
MESSAGE.Translation: So many before entering the maze...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ああ、想像するだけでも頭が重い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ah, just thinking about it makes my head hurt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ah, just thinking about it makes my head hurt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たしはようやく腰を上げる。
沙耶@「ああ、忘れるとこだった」
沙耶@「あらよっと」
着のポケットからそれを取り出して、無造作に放り投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took ❛that❜ out of my coat pocket, and casually dropped it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took ❛that❜ out of my coat pocket, and casually dropped it.
